MENU.TITLE: Menu
MENU.TEXT: Welcome to Black Burguer, the place where the art of burgers comes to life! We present you with an irresistible menu, full of delicious options that will satisfy all lovers of artisanal burgers. ...

OPTIONS.TITLE: Burgers
OPTIONS.DESCRIPTION: Our burgers are made with fresh and selected ingredients, combined in a unique way to create incredible flavors.

OPTIONS.TITLE: Combos
OPTIONS.DESCRIPTION: You can choose to build your own burger, selecting the ingredients that please you the most, or try our carefully crafted combos.

OPTIONS.TITLE: Vegetarian and Vegan Options
OPTIONS.DESCRIPTION: In addition to burgers, we also offer vegetarian and vegan options, so that everyone can enjoy a Black Burguer experience.

COMPANY.TITLE: About the Company
COMPANY.TEXT: Black Burguer was born out of a passion for burgers and the quest for a unique gastronomic experience. Founded by a group of friends who are passionate about cooking, our company aims to offer high-quality artisanal burgers, prepared with care and dedication. ...
